meanings.definition: A tool used for turning screws.
meanings.sent1: My dad always uses screwdrivers to fix things around the house.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic reached for his screwdrivers to tighten the loose screws.
meanings.sent3: I tried to eat soup with a screwdriver, but it didn't work out well.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like screwdrivers, slowly turning in my mind, making me doubt everything.
meanings.sent5: The shiny screwdrivers in the toolbox gleamed under the bright light.

meanings.definition: A cocktail made with vodka and orange juice.
meanings.sent1: At the party, I ordered a refreshing screwdriver to cool off.
meanings.sent2: The bartender mixed the perfect screwdriver with just the right amount of vodka and orange juice.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled my screwdriver on the dance floor, creating a sticky mess.
meanings.sent4: The sunset looked like a giant screwdriver, mixing the colors of the sky.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the screwdriver filled the room, tempting everyone to take a sip.
